documents.document: @retrogamer Welcome to the family, son.
@baloobas1 Rez on PSVR is basically a spiritual experience.
People sure love photoshopping things onto t-shirts worn by Game of Thrones actors regardless of if it makes any sense or not.
Music is so good in Turrican 2. First time hearing it in stereo. https://t.co/K4npk4EBQ6
Picked up a rather lovely Amiga 1200 today. Really nice condition. https://t.co/EGAdjgVZ5H
@Jam_sponge loved that game so much. And 4 player offline player co-op on the GameCube was amazing fun.
A new audio drama series I produced called ‘Shopping for Beginners’ starts airing next week on @nearfm https://t.co/xWIZaCFqdj #AudioDrama
@faduda I think people genuinely have forgotten the plagiarising Daniel Clowes thing.
@baloobas1 they all just became caricatures of themselves. Doesn’t have any heart any more. Bobs Burgers is great though, for now.
@baloobas1 Definitely. It’s just so weird to watch it now and it’s all about twitter and smart phones. Like those Seinfeld Today parodies.
Urgh. Poochy just turned up. This is a step too far contemporary Simpsons.
Trying to watch new episodes of the Simpsons. It’s like every episode is either about apps or vaping.
I can only assume the people who are raving about La La Land have just never seen a musical before.
@EvilPhil looks like a fresh account. They renamed the old one potus44
@Bracken3000 supposed to be Obama. It’s like a lot of Irish people never got the memo that blackface is super racist.
@Sarklor doesn’t seem to be any way to report it to facebook either.
Holy crap! Blackface to sell mortgages . What’s wrong with this country? https://t.co/Y2feTK21HB
@damienmulley I’m out of the loop. At first I thought this was a reference to Stephen King’s Dreamcatcher.
@stuffiwrote actually started watching it again only last week but was bummed out that version I found had different music.
@stuffiwrote it’s whatever version I would have bought in Virgin back in the day with the new score Manga video added.
@stuffiwrote oh I have one too.
My character has managed to survive 4 years in the game. A lion did eat her leg though so now she’s gotten really good with a bow.
Enjoyed Kingdom Death Monster a lot. But you’d have to be super into your miniatures to make the $300 asking price… https://t.co/5gSrSsxEW7
@FDHarrington this is the original version. Pretty complicated so far. But it seems pretty cool. Not sure if it’s €300 cool yet though.
Trying out Kingdom Death Monster today. Seem to be doing okay against the white lion. https://t.co/f8BfrNLg9T
@damienmulley I do not care for his batman voice one bit.
@DeusExCinema @pixiegrace this is true. Haven’t seen the first one. Does he do a lot of stuff with candles?
@DeusExCinema @pixiegrace wick as in candle which has been lit once more?
@stuffiwrote it’s the Nintendo tax. Got to pay it to play some of the most polished games ever made.
@stuffiwrote yeah. Amazon is just over that for the console as well isn’t it?
@stuffiwrote €320 in GameStop seems to be the best price I’ve seen.
@stuffiwrote yep. Region free.
Now it’s time for me to ‘switch’ to bed.
#NintendoSwitch looks great. Day one purchase for me. Got to pay the Nintendo tax if you want to play the best games out there.
It’s time to ‘switch’ to a better translator. #NintendoSwitch
What are the implications of this on Mario lore? #NintendoSwitch https://t.co/xqfV9yMObM
New Mario game. Now with new hat! #NintendoSwitch
The Nintendo Switch has inherited DNA from all the previous systems like uh… the handle on the GameCube that you’d… https://t.co/v1QT9IQnSh
Radio Drama production meeting in @nearfm this morning to discuss our upcoming projects for the new year.… https://t.co/AGZdFRPPyy
This was pretty good: https://t.co/HuurJ7ZDfY
Noticed that an Ashley Madison app has popped up on the iTunes Charts. Funny that Family Sharing is a feature. https://t.co/MeQDBUTvxd
Barb Wire is basically a remake of Casablanca, oddly enough.
Making a list of films set in 2017 so I can check them for historical inaccuracies. So far Barb Wire seems pretty s… https://t.co/q8GnGUGJKF
Wearing my @UterusPrime t-shirt this evening. Bodily autonomy is the right of all sentient beings. #RepealThe8th https://t.co/BiS7srpSao
@therealfuzzix Not All Snowmen
@stuffiwrote it gets completely crazy in the Black Goku arc. Some great fights in it.
Some good points on Rogue One. I got nothing from that movie. https://t.co/GEKjsXp9NG
@baloobas1 plotwise it was a completely pointless movie was only ever going to work on the strength of the characters and it didnt deliver.
@baloobas1 just couldn’t get past the terrible acting. Was like they only shot one take on each scene. Completely took me out of it.
@baloobas1 the only thing in that dreary movie that brought me brief moment of joy.
@baloobas1 The MSE droids?
@robinwriting they look great
@xiancooke Ha. I was thinking Michael Richards. But that’s even worse!
Somehow I think I’ll be sticking with Netflix.
So Amazon Prime video is about 50 movies and an expensive TV show made by racists? Does have Seinfeld though, no racists there.
@robinwriting now you have me wondering what games people were playing 1016.
Big piece on board games in the Sunday Business Post today. Lots about @BoardGamesIRE in there too: https://t.co/ycROzz5hnO
27 years since this episode of The Simpsons aired: https://t.co/CkeBs8mWpe
Oh. There goes @Meteor_Mobile data again.
@damienmulley @Meteor_Mobile Was super frustrating. So many selfies left unpublished.
Anyone else having issues with @Meteor_Mobile data today?
Still can’t get over how bizarrely terrible the acting was in Rogue 1. Was like they shot just 1 line of dialogue at a time. No natural flow
Rogue One was awful. Whole thing felt like their first run through of the script at a table read. Atrocious stuff.
This is true. Cry all the tears! https://t.co/gtzM9LsP06
D&D night tonight. The party are still exploring the mega dungeon I designed: https://t.co/QcpckhzSeV
@DeusExCinema Great premise. That guy who ripped the face off of another guy who was begging for mercy. What if he wasn’t a good guy?
@Bracken3000 You can run it in 1080p on the pro and it is sopposed to improve the frame rate. At 4K it’s supposed to be even worse.
The Last Guardian seems pretty great so far. But I might need a PS4 Pro for it, as the frame rate makes me ill and I’m no frame rate snob.
Oh that Star Wars VR mission on PSVR is pretty special. Proper childhood wish fulfilment there.
Sheesh. So many people buying tickets to see Axl Rose again. This is the same mentality that allows Fianna Fail to constantly get re-elected
I never cease to be amazed at literally every other humans ability to eat soup faster than me.
My copy of @beastsofbalance arrived today. https://t.co/L8IUCJEsME
@dreamfeelx oh yes. Adams and Shannon are great in it, but the message you were supposed to take from it all seemed super horrible.
Had a great game of Cyclades this evening. Managed to just about snatch victory thanks to the Satyr stealing a 4th… https://t.co/BVPRGFDlRW
@DeusExCinema real shame can’t get something like this really excellent Transformees comic: https://t.co/EX5SR2iwVd
@DeusExCinema almost every shot has a completely different letterbox. Bonkers.
@DeusExCinema did you notice how often the aspect ratio changes in that new trailer? It’s super distracting.
And we’re currently 101 in the overall Irish iTunes podcast charts. Meet up this evening. Come along!… https://t.co/zObM16sbsb
The latest @BoardGamesIRE podcast is available now. https://t.co/Dy36mpGywk We’re currently number 1 in Games & Hob… https://t.co/Wr5igytukb
Oh sure Kojima’s new game looks great but Konami’s been working on great stuff too: https://t.co/2Z5QG5dBgg
@ElaineEdwards Wahlberg viciously beat 2 Vietnamese men in racialy motivated attacks. But apparently he forgave himself so it’s all okay.
@Tettix yeah. Seems to be an issue. No fix yet. I just disconnected the calendar app from iCloud to stop it.
Today’s relevant Simpsons clip for Trump’s America: https://t.co/NUxSR94Vsg
@Emma_SBP_money Sure thing.
Guess Eric Roberts has got to put food on the table somehow.
Just saw ‘Stalked by my Doctor’ on Netflix. Can’t believe there’s also a sequel to it. And the director has made several ‘Stalked By’ movies
@taraannosaur Green is not a creative colour!
Go see this. It’s brilliant! https://t.co/YvqvstF1Tg
Played some Call of Cthulhu 7th edition this evening. https://t.co/zDBUEQwk4m
Could never get into Gilmore Girls. That one guy is too old to wear a baseball cap in that manner. It’s offputting and unsettling.
@robinwriting isn’t the final card on this Brexit?
@baloobas1 ah. I use a twitter client so I don’t have to deal with their awful website. ‘Your Name’ was brilliant, though.
Have a spare ticket to (now sold out) screening of ‘Your Name’ at 8 in the @LightHouseD7 if anyone wants to come along.
@benosteen he was pretty friendly. No wonder they’re easy to hunt.
Spotted this bird at the end of my road this morning. Anyone know what kind it is? #birb https://t.co/d2tNjfCt6j
Delivering this workshop this evening as part of Explore Your Archive Week https://t.co/klv8GngizL
This reads like a patch note for an MMO: https://t.co/XlpkxHqjbH
Only the very best jokes require a knowledge of early Kim Cattrall movies.
Doing my own Mannequin challenge where I loudly play “Nothing’s Gonna Stop us Now“ by Starship on a loop until a neighbour complains.
Remembering a more innocent time of fake news…. https://t.co/kVyu1M0YIf
